definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 這時，方小舟才發現許嫣然是個警察。

sentences.english: Special operating conditions are taken into consideration by determining the thermally permissible operating speed.
sentences.chinese: 確定熱容許運行速度時，應考慮特殊的運行條件。

sentences.english: Because the book was written in haste, it contains many mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 這本書因爲倉促許寫成有許多錯誤。

sentences.english: Granny Xu got a whole pile of money for her birthday. She called Yusi to her.
sentences.chinese: 許老太太在生日那天就收到了一大筆錢。

sentences.english: The Eisch family therefore was forced to establish a glass production of its own.
sentences.chinese: 許愛家因此被迫建立一個他們自己的玻璃杯產品。

sentences.english: He is the well-known business expert of Southeast Asia, Mr. Xu Ningning.
sentences.chinese: 他就是我國知名的東南亞商務專家許寧寧先生。

sentences.english: Fed Governor Warsh is will step down on March 31.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲官員瓦爾許任期將於3月31日到期。

sentences.english: Jesus replied, "Moses permitted you to divorce your wives because your hearts were hard.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌說，摩西因爲你們的心硬，所以許你們休妻。

sentences.english: Jun about father Xu Chongming is a warlord teachers, Wei Jun is his old subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 君約父親許崇明是一名軍閥師長，魏俊是他的舊下屬。

sentences.english: Ms. Xu does not serve in any directorship roles of any other public company. Ms.
sentences.chinese: 許女士不擔任其它任何上市公司的管理者職位。

sentences.english: Every weekend there are dozens of football and basketball games on television.
sentences.chinese: 每個週末，電視裏都會播放許多場橄欖球賽和籃球賽。

sentences.english: To Prof. Xu I dedicate this volume in taken of affection and gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 謹以本書獻給許教授以表敬慕和感激之情。

sentences.english: Heo YoungSaeng, Flooded by invites to Turkey, Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 許永生，被盛情邀請到訪土耳其，東歐等地。

sentences.english: Many represent a cross-fertilization between biology and other fields of science.
sentences.chinese: 許許多課程都涉及到了生物以及其他的科學領域。

sentences.english: They had no heads but had legs sticking out at odd angles.
sentences.chinese: 它們沒有腦袋，許多隻腳橫七豎八地伸出來。

sentences.english: He was certified dead at his home by a doctor at approximately 8pm that evening, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 當晚八時許，醫生在家裏宣告了他的死亡。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
